name: v25.8.1
body:
# What’s Changed

## 🛠️ General Fixes & Improvements
- Fix - Package `apt-xapian-index` missing on Trixie by @Grippy98 in [#8202](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8202)  
- Fix and improve Armbian GH Action by @igorpecovnik in [#8201](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8201)  
- partitioning: fix compressed BTRFS creation by @alex3d in [#8200](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8200)  
- Allwinner: replace `bc` with `awk` in temperature check by @igorpecovnik in [#8205](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8205)  
- Work if no `customize-image.sh` present by @iav in [#8222](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8222)  
- grub: ensure `tty0` console if others used by @rpardini in [#8247](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8247)  
- artifacts: force `fsync()` before caching by @rpardini in [#8242](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8242)  
- rootfs-to-image: drop `--sparse` (too slow) by @rpardini in [#8249](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8249)  
- docker: speed up extension checks by @rpardini in [#8248](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8248)  
- kernel-debs: retry `make clean` with logs by @rpardini in [#8241](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8241)  
- Signing key: keep symlink to old location by @igorpecovnik in [#8282](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8282)  
- motd: fix login screen alignment by @leggewie in [#8322](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8322)  
- README cleanup, update logo, declutter by @igorpecovnik in [#8391](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8391)  
- Plymouth: update boot logo by @igorpecovnik in [#8381](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8381)  
- fix firstlogin password creation on sid by @amazingfate in [#8415](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8415)  
- gcc-arm-linux-gnueabi: install conditionally by @leggewie in [#8401](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8401)  
- Don’t copy id_ecdsa if not needed by @gbrdead in [#8446](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8446)  
- minor spelling mistakes by @leggewie in [#8450](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8450)  
- APA extension: small fixes by @leggewie in [#8509](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8509)  

## 📦 Packaging & Repositories
- Trixie: drop non-existing packages by @igorpecovnik in [#8279](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8279)  
- Bullseye: drop backports repo (gone) by @igorpecovnik in [#8437](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8437)  
- Debian: drop security repo from package lists by @igorpecovnik in [#8444](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8444)  
- Debian Trixie: declare supported by @igorpecovnik in [#8470](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8470)  
- Wireless drivers: bump commit hash, mark deprecated by @igorpecovnik in [#8408](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8408)  
- kernel-debs: use dynamic kernel image names by @amazingfate in [#8451](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8451)  
- Improve WiFi support for sun50iw1 family by @leggewie in [#8467](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8467)  
- drop `apt-xapian-index` and pavumeter from desktops by @leggewie in [#8356](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8356)  
- update plasma-workspace pkgs for RB5 by @leggewie in [#8357](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8357)  
- config/desktop: disable mate-sntray-plugin on Trixie by @leggewie in [#8491](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8491)  
- config/desktop: update gnome-bluetooth in Noble/Trixie by @leggewie in [#8502](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8502)  
- Preparation for HTTP proxy caching by @EvilOlaf in [#8281](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8281)  

## 🔑 Repository Signing & Security
- Add dual signing support by @igorpecovnik in [#8320](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8320)  
- Add new repository key by @igorpecovnik in [#8323](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8323)  

## ⚙️ Kernel Updates
- mvebu: bump EDGE kernel to 6.12 by @igorpecovnik in [#8193](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8193)  
- sunxi 6.12: switch to v6.12.30 by @The-going in [#8233](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8233)  
- sunxi-6.15: bump EDGE to v6.15 by @The-going in [#8270](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8270)  
- Allwinner: bump current to 6.12.35 & edge to 6.15.4 by @igorpecovnik in [#8337](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8337)  
- rockchip64: bump edge to 6.16-rc3 by @EvilOlaf in [#8328](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8328)  
- mainline-kernel: bump 6.16 → released by @amazingfate in [#8443](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8443)  
- uefi-arm64: bump to 6.16 by @amazingfate in [#8453](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8453)  
- rockchip edge: bump to 6.16 by @paolosabatino in [#8435](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8435)  
- rpi4b: bump edge to 6.16 by @EvilOlaf in [#8390](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8390)  
- BPI-F3: update linux-6.6.95 → 99 by @pyavitz in [#8411](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8411)  
- SpacemiT: linux-6.6.93 → 95 by @pyavitz in [#8333](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8333)  
- odroidxu4: bump to 6.6.93 → 100 by @belegdol in [#8277](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8277), [#8442](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8442)  
- Bump rockchip32 edge kernel to 6.15 by @paolosabatino in [#8262](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8262)  
- Bump imx6, mvebu, xu4 kernels, mark wdk2023 EoS by @igorpecovnik in [#8410](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8410)  

## 🚀 Bootloader / U-Boot & ATF
- khadas-edge2: fix u-boot by @efectn in [#8220](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8220)  
- Gateway GZ80x: switch back to u-boot v2024.10 by @pyavitz in [#8216](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8216)  
- nanopct6(-lts): bump u-boot to v2025.04 final by @rpardini in [#8239](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8239)  
- odroidhc4: u-boot v2025.04, unify configs by @rpardini in [#8244](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8244)  
- mixtible-blade3: revert to radxa u-boot v2024.03 by @rpardini in [#8243](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8243)  
- khadas-vim3: bump u-boot v2025.04 final by @rpardini in [#8238](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8238)  
- nanopct6(-lts): switch to mainline ATF + u-boot for current by @rpardini in [#8219](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8219)  
- tinkerboard-2: bump u-boot v2025.04 by @hyx0329 in [#8268](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8268)  
- quartz64a: bump u-boot to v2025.04 final by @rpardini in [#8250](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8250)  
- BananaPi BPI-M4-Zero: bump u-boot v2025.01 & v2025.07 by @pyavitz in [#8339](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8339), [#8434](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8434)  
- orangepi5pro: bump u-boot v2025.07 (eMMC) by @c127dev in [#8417](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8417)  
- MBa8MPxL: bump u-boot to v2024.04 by @schmiedelm in [#8291](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8291)  
- station-m3: update u-boot patches by @chainsx in [#8424](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8424)  
- lckfb-taishanpi: update u-boot patches by @chainsx in [#8428](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8428)  
- rock-4se: binman boot with mainline ATF by @jclds139 in [#8449](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8449)  

## 📡 Drivers & Hardware Support
- Update Realtek RTL8822CS external driver by @adeepn in [#8195](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8195)  
- Unlock radios on RPi with service by @igorpecovnik in [#8210](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8210)  
- helios4: fix WOL service by @djurny in [#8235](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8235)  
- Rock-5C: enable thermal sensors by @mdziekon in [#8430](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8430)  
- Fix DSI display on RPi5 by @CaWeissWz in [#8294](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8294)  
- Restore RockPI-S audio by @brentr in [#8360](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8360)  
- SMART AM40: add PHY LED config by @retro98boy in [#8431](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8431)  
- Gateway GZ80x: add rtl8723ds BT support by @pyavitz in [#8351](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8351)  
- Orangepi Zero: drop Crust support (fix reboot) by @igorpecovnik in [#8503](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8503)  
- linux-rk35xx-vendor: add LTE em05 driver by @rafayahmed317 in [#8484](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8484), [#8508](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8508)  
- Xradio: adjust for kernel 6.16+ by @igorpecovnik in [#8469](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8469)  
- Innosilicon USB3 phy driver for rk3328 by @paolosabatino in [#8510](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8510)  
- Netplan: DHCP on `lan*`/`wan*` interfaces by @djurny in [#8259](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8259)  

## 🖥️ Board Support (New / Updated)
- sunxi-6.14: bananapi_m4_berry → supported by @The-going in [#8226](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8226)  
- SpacemiT: enable audio, bump kernels by @pyavitz in [#8221](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8221), [#8333](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8333), [#8481](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8481)  
- CAINIAO CNIoT-CORE initial support by @retro98boy in [#8208](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8208)  
- NanoPi R3S LTS added by @pyavitz in [#8300](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8300)  
- BananaPi BPI-CM4 Waveshare IO-BASE-B fixes by @pyavitz in [#8303](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8303)  
- Add imb3588 board by @JackHuang021 in [#8267](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8267)  
- Add KickPi K2B board by @pyavitz in [#8452](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8452)  
- Add DshanPi A1 (RK3576) by @chainsx in [#8380](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8380)  
- Orange Pi 5 Pro initial support by @c127dev in [#8348](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8348)  
- Orange Pi 5 Ultra fixes & improvements by @khusika in [#8373](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8373)  
- Rock-5B-Plus: align Edge with upstream by @HeyMeco in [#8338](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8338)  
- BananaPi BPI-M4-Zero DTS + overlays fixes by @pyavitz in [#8339](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8339), [#8434](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8434), [#8448](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8448), [#8454](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8454), [#8498](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8498)  
- BananaPi CM4/M2S: revert SDIO WiFi change by @pyavitz in [#8495](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8495)  
- Nanopi R6/R5: netplan fix (wan→wan1) by @igorpecovnik in [#8325](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8325)  
- PocketBeagle2: image fixes + USB serial enable by @Ayush1325 in [#8283](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8283), [#8349](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8349), [#8370](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8370)  
- Pcduino2/3: add HDMI, fix drm regression by @Ryzer58 in [#8341](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8341)  
- MediaTek Filogic: BananaPi R4 community support by @chainsx in [#8407](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8407)  
- Radxa Cubie A5E: migrate to mainline 6.16 by @juanesf in [#8447](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8447)  
- coolpi-genbook: vendor branch by @andyshrk in [#8275](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8275)  
- Inovato quadra bootfix + u-boot bump by @igorpecovnik in [#8334](https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8334)  


## New Contributors
* @jsuhaas22 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8223
* @fbernier made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8234
* @hyx0329 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8268
* @JackHuang021 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8267
* @CaWeissWz made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8294
* @veduco made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8352
* @d93921012 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8366
* @c127dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8348
* @khusika made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8373
* @ZjemCiKolege made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8387
* @gbrdead made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8446
* @jclds139 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8449
* @vascoguita made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8466
* @rafayahmed317 made their first contribution in https://github.com/armbian/build/pull/8484

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/armbian/build/compare/v25.5.1...v25.8.1
